Blog.post: hi.. 1st blog ever.. haha.. finally.. *Yeah! ok.. Todae.. woke up at 9plus.. my slp was disrupted by dat daniel's call.. i was sick the dae be4.. too stress i guess.. cos art work nid to hand up liaox.. *OMG~ and PRELIMs r jux nxt week after our 'holiday'? so we r like doing last mins thingy? (dat's wad my class is good at..) =x.. haha.. den go bathe.. prepare everything den set off to sch.. cal aloy on the way too.. ask whether is she dere not.. but.. hu noes.. some ppl still on bus.. OMG.. haha.. aniwae.. i reach to the bus stop den walk to sch, 1/2 dead.. walk to class den started painting.. haha.. veri sick ah.. the board somemore dun wanna listen to mi.. colour how mani times, the colour oso dun wanna stay dere.. alamak.. den so pissed.. after abt 3omins or so.. one sickening woman, came to my class tell us sae must pack up liaox.. wah sei.. i was like 'eh.. i jux started lehx..' den alvin oso.. cos he came late.. den got to do pack up.. we slowly slowly pack.. den lata we set off sch wanna go eat dat time.. dat woman cal us.. gather us den started scolding us.. OMG.. so sick ok.. sae sae sae.. like a radio spoilt liaox kip playing dat type.. haha.. =x.. sae wad we so slow, dily daly take own sweet time hai dem late for their meeting.. we r like.. so wad? but of cos we noe it's our fault lahx.. but sae until veri na ting lohx.. hu oso not happy.. den after she sae finish bird, mi, loy and maine went to eat.. *yummy.. cos i and loy hungry.. haha.. after eating.. took cab to bird's house do art.. veri funny ah.. the taxi behind not can onli sit 3 persons lohx.. but we special lehx.. we 4 persons.. haha.. cos mi and bird dunno dat maine and loy sitting behind.. den we open door.. sit inside.. luff at each other.. haha.. oso dunno y.. haha.. the taxi uncle oso luff.. LAME rite.. =D.. den reach bird's house liaox.. we go put things.. den bird let his dog out.. OMG.. i run like siaox ok.. haha.. loy too.. LOLx.. lata we go buy thi8ngs eat again.. haha.. dne go buy something too.. *important de.. haha.. secret too.. hee.. den went his house do art.. paint like siaox char bo and ta bo.. haha.. lata bird go create blog write miss bel all dat.. *OMG.. so mushy.. haha.. =X.. but.. is i write de.. haha.. =X.. aniwae. after dat slack abit den pakc up went home at ard 6? yup~! Dat's it..

Hmm.. todae's a most tiring day for most of my classmates.. most of dem r dying.. haha.. cos of dat N lvl ART's thingy.. so rush.. everybody paint like mad.. while painting oso must think of our preparatory work.. alamak.. brain bursting man~ all becuming the ' brain ' of pinky and the brain.. whahahaha.. aniwae.. i woke up.. slack abit.. the go shit.. whahahaha.. den go bathe, go sch.. den we started painting.. muahahaha.. i settle my lunch by calling bird take away chicken rice.. *yummy~! i found out dat our class now in a trend of eating chicken rice.. LOLx.. we veri LAME lehx.. chicken rice trend is amoi sae de.. so she's the one dat's LAME.. haha.. =X.. erm.. after painting like mad.. some ppl in our class relax.. play cards.. OMG.. like chalet like dat.. *pengx.. after dat abt 5plus everyone got to pack up and go home.. or else dat idiotic sickening naggy woman cum to our class and sae, sae, sae again.. hu noes hor.. after we go buy our snacks, suay suay saw her.. wah pengx.. win 4D oso not so lucky lahx.. haha.. see her den maine started saying her.. haha.. so funny.. on the way home i kip luffing like mad gal like dat.. until bel oso cant ta han.. haha.. yeah.. and my dat mad mum scold mi for nth once again.. *SICK~! i dun even noe wad's going on and she jux cal mi and scream on the phone.. OMG.. as if i noe like dat.. haix.. ppl reading must be thinking y i'm i always saying my mum.. but if u'r in my shoes u will feel the same as i m.. *sadded.. no one understands mi.. not even my mum..

ok.. i shall start abt yesterdae de.. i meet daniel after my tuition, den we decided to go sentosa to take fotos for bel's prepar. work.. went dere and bird was hungry den.. haha.. so went to eat chicken rice.. *yummy~ haha.. den drink fruit juicey.. hehe.. lata took a bus dere went to buy admission fee den went to butterfly park cum insects too.. went dere actually i dun wanna go in de.. cos too X and somemore bird sae he wanna pay for it..*OMG~ so X man.. cant.. so i sae i stay outside wait for him betta.. but.. in the end dere got 2 old gong gong and ah ma good heart let mi and bird go in for $5 each.. *special offer.. hehe.. so went in.. we were like tourists.. haha.. cos grow so big 1st time step in dere.. den C dis "wah" one time, C dat oso "wah" again.. haha.. den we went to take fotos for bel liaox go walk walk inside the park.. it's veri nice in dere.. but sadly.. the butterflies all like repeated de nehx.. aniwae.. we took a foto at one of the waterfall dere.. haha.. more like tourists.. LOLx.. but nbm lahx.. memory mahx.. haha.. den we went to check out the park.. hmm.. got mani beetles (almost repeated..) =X.. den go thru the link where it link to the insect park.. dat place realli amazed mi.. haha.. got mani insects all so colourful and nice.. but it look alittle too fake le.. cos dey do some colouring on dem.. but it's still nice.. lata saw the leaf insect.. bird so blur man.. dun even noe where it is or how it look like.. haha.. den one small boy point to his sista, bird so pai sei.. haha.. =X.. after dat got one section is dat u could take foto with scopia*did i get it rite? den i dare bird to go take one.. haha.. den i purposely slowly slowly help him take.. he was shouting like mad over dere.. LOLx.. but i heck care.. i even cal the man dun care him.. whahahaha.. the man did not care him too.. haha.. *naughty mi.. whahahaha.. den lata wen to the muscial fountain.. go dere relax.. den bird sae veri romantic.. nxt time wanna bring bel dere.. haha.. bel.. u must remind him to bring u dere hor.. haha.. ;) den sit dere hear the piano songs.. OMG.. so nice and relaxing.. wahahahaha.. den got the show, we sit dere see.. alamak.. more like tourists lohx.. haha.. after dat we had a slow walk down to the ferry terminal den to the 'bus-stop' and took the blue line back to the visitor de place.. took a bus and went esplanade find amoi go c fireworks and 5566.. hee~ reach dere hor.. OMG so mani ppl.. den heard dat guides oso dere.. but no body inform mi.. onli till last mintue.. sadded.. but.. nbm.. i still get to see it after dat.. it was so so nice.. i told bird sae how i wish bel was here.. den u could ask her dat Qns. u had always wanted to ask.. haha.. den he sae ya lohx.. hmm.. while seeing the fireworks.. i have mani feelings wif mi.. sad, happy, etc.. memories all rise frm mine mind all of a sudden.. remind mi of mani things.. but.. thru seeing dat wonderful fireworks, let mi noe dat everything dat happen was worth it.. and i realli hope to see it wif dat someone (if onli i could mit dat someone..) one day.. hee..*fa hwa ci.. haha.. den after finsih.. went to find amoi.. alamak.. so mani ppl man.. den the road so so messy.. cars and humans all over.. so scare will bang someone down. .and oso hor.. all phone call cant be receive sia.. OMG.. cos too mani ppl use their lines dere.. den could not cal amoi.. so stand dere wait for abt 1/2 hour? den could cal amoi thru phone.. dne bird bought mi running frm streets to streets to fulleton hotel*did i get it rite? jux to find amoi.. den we went to find the concert.. OMG.. so mani ppl.. but we manage to get a wonderful view to see dem.. den ah.. a stupid couple.. bock mine view worx.. somemore kip pushing my amoi away.. sick lohx.. wanna see nbm mahx.. but must think of others too lehx.. so selfish.. wah lua.. nbm.. den 5566 came out.. wah.. how tired i was i oso feel energtic! haha.. and dat xie zhi.. OMG.. *faint.. haha.. amoi saw her toro oso faint.. LOLx.. i found out dat toro's de voice oso quite nice de worx.. especially when he sing smoothing de songs.. OMG.. *faint.. haha.. den reach home SUPER late.. den no taxi.. den bird kip telling mi and amoi sae he's a ' fit zai ' haha.. so i sae since amoi tired rite.. u dis fit zai carry her lohx.. haha.. den he realli did it man.. OMG.. bring my amoi run over streets.. making her scream like mad.. haha.. den passerby see le sae....... haha.. bird.. u noe, i noe can le.. haha.. den in the end bird de papa and mama cum fetch us home.. haha.. thankx alot~! yup.. and dat's wad happen yesterdae.. P.S:maine.. sorrie ah.. forgotten to cal u out dat nitex.. hope u dun angry or ani o how think mi hor.. sorrie.. ok.. and as for todae.. slack whole day lohx.. whahahaha.. woke up at 9plus.. den eat.. rest abit.. den eat again.. wah pengx eh.. grow fat ah.. den rest abit.. slp.. haha.. den while i slp bird blast my hp man.. 15 miss cal lehx.. OMG~!!! i to wad happen.. scare mi.. den cal him.. tok abit of rubbsish lohx.. den went to bathe go my aunty's house celebrate her birthday todae.. haha.. Naional Day lehx.. dun pray pray.. haha.. den saw the fire works.. cal bird to remind him to watch.. too bad lahx.. some ppl can onli watch in thru TeeBee.. but mi.. not same.. FULL view! LOLx.. wahahahahaha.. den watch s'pore idol.. OMG.. dat guy is jux making a fool out of himself.. =X.. LOLx.. wahahahaha.. k lahx.. dat's the end of mine day todae.. C ya tml ya~! *muacks~! miss ya.. NItex..

OMG.. so tired todae.. do paper 1/2 way go la la land le.. hehe.. cos yesterdae did not slp well.. i think tonite nid burn mid-nite oil le.. cos ART not yet done.. hmm.. todae got one announcement dat dis fridae got a singer(zhang feng qi) wanna cum our sch sing song.. not mani ppl fancy him aniwae.. but confirm dat dae he cum mani ppl will sae he handsome de.. whahahaha.. always like dat de.. haha.. gals.. aniwae.. i was not dat excited aniwae.. cos not 5566 de tony.. whahahahaha.. ok.. den go class pack up abit den start eng paper 1 after dat, we start on our ART once again.. and all go bongus.. haha.. after paper 2.. mi & bird went to look for mr ong and dere the most interesting part.. haha.. i saw the poster of dat singer.. wif his signature somemore sia.. haha.. den bird sae not lahx.. not his.. is print de.. den i show him.. den we 2 start to quarrel over it.. like young kids man.. =X.. haha.. aniwae.. we decided dat i got hold of it.. den i dun dare take so kip asking the t-cher whether i could have it.. but all sae dunno hus, so cant take.. but dat bird hor.. bad de lehx.. kip wanting to take it back to class.. =X.. den he oso sae i stupid.. kip asking t-chers abt it.. *sadded.. den after dat ASS. sianx.. den went market go buy food~ *yummy.. chicken rice again.. LOLx.. i tink we r realli mad over chicken rice nehx.. after dat.. we started painting once again.. OMG.. painting realli can KILL.. haha.. hoping to do a good job for my N lvls ART.. cos it's my life.. *yeah~! and i cant afford to fail it.. *CHOY~!!! aniwae.. i jux wanna sae good luck to all my classmates hu dun even give a damn abt their ART.. yup.. and oso did not feel veri good todae.. mood was swinging here and dere.. and ya.. jin liang help mi for my ART.. thankx alot man~~!!!

ok.. the pig is once again back.. whahahaha.. todae kinda stress.. chinese paper.. OMG.. i did not study.. hoping to pass it.. yup.. aniwae.. todae everybody in mine class chiong for their ART like mad.. haha.. can see frm the faces ya.. all DYING .. bird too.. haix.. he worry dis worry dat.. worst dan mi.. LOLx.. =X.. aniwae.. he's veri worried for bel.. cos she always veri lazy to do or no time do.. make bird worry until go siao le.. haha.. *loving couple.. *envy.. haix.. wahahaha.. and ya.. forgotten to do smth. THANKX BIRD FOR DAT POSTER .. whahahahahaha.. *sssshhhsss.. our secret.. haha.. aniwae.. quite a number of ppl noe le.. wahahahaha.. ok.. and of cos todae's paper mani ppl slept thru it.. haix.. see le.. got nth sae sia.. so disappointed.. haix.. aniwae.. dey wun care nor understand de.. so y care sia.. lata ppl sae i KPO .. life for myself betta.. care for ppl hu i think i shld care.. whahahahaha.. den lata go mrs. tan dere.. do art.. paint background nia.. and 'highlight' my ART.. den bel and bird 'cold war'.. alamak.. realli like stead nehx.. dunno y dun wanna go stead.. beside ppl see le oso worry for both of dem.. haha.. den lata dey 2 tok tok among demself ok abit le.. and the scene was like OMG.. so mushy.. whahahahaha.. bird, if u'r reading dis dun have hard feelings k??! hehe.. cos amoi oso feel dat way.. hehe.. aniwae.. todae i was too stress to think of ART and tot of smth super LAME ! i told bird dat i have form up a small 'family'.. haha.. and it's the FIT ZAI jia zhu .. make up of mi, amoi and bird.. haha.. so nxt time got anithing can share share among our wonderful family.. LOLx.. lame rite.. but wad to do.. dat's wad i do to destress.. haha.. and of cos make bird smile again.. dun like see him sad.. veri UGLY .. eh.. if u'r reading dis.. for goodness sake.. u shld noe wad to do nxt time.. whahahaha.. aniwae.. he got his reason to all dat.. he got beaten up yesterdae by his....... becos of his ART.. haix.. poor fit zai.. nbm lahx hor.. u fit zai lehx.. haha.. hmm.. and now i got to think of how to return money to bird and amoi.. haha.. yup.. so vex by money.. sick of money.. no money realli can die nehx.. *HELPPPPPP~ k lahx.. gtg le.. tired.. veri sick too.. sadded.. lack of LOVE .. haha.. amoi u see dis dun luff ah.. =X..

ok.. got to write wad happen yesterdae again.. haha.. cos yesterdae veri late den cum home so.. nb write.. whahahahaha.. yesterdae dat singer came to my sch.. he look quite handsome yet very cute.. haha.. but i still prefer xie zhi.. haha.. be4 he came, my whole schling yesterdae was jux OMG !, super boring.. cos mani ppl nb come so t-cher nb teach.. haix.. so hopeless rite.. den slack whole day.. slp oso.. =X.. hee~ den lata got special ASS. and dat's the time where he came.. hmm.. he's veri cute.. toking abit like jay zhou.. haha.. cos tok veri fast den the mic not good.. cant hear probably.. haha.. and somemore jay is he's 't-cher' worx.. haha.. dat's y will tok like dat.. haha.. aniwae.. he sing, dance den whole hall so HIGH ! haha.. especially my amoi.. OMG.. she hor.. histercial*did i get it rite? man.. 'high' until face so so red.. and oso dat zhang feng qi like have a crush on my amoi.. cos everytime he sings.. he look at amoi.. LOLLLLLx.. but moi dun belive lehx.. haha.. den lata he ask for pupils to go up stage compet wif him the rap.. so he personally came down to amoi.. but she dun wan.. alamak.. so si tu pit rite.. haha.. =X.. *amoi no hard feelings?! hehe.. cos she sae she dunno.., if she were to noe she CONFIRM . plus GURANTEE go up! LOLx.. ya.. and todae the hall is super de HOT .. haha.. everybody sweating like a PIG .. whahahahaha.. =X.. cos hall got too much of body heat le.. haha.. den at abt 2.. he got to go off le.. den mani gals went up to take foto of him by HANDPHONE camera.. it's a good thing ah lai no catch.. or else all die sia.. haha.. den lata after sch amoi kip wanting to go find him sign the clothes she got for free give.. haha.. so i faster go pack my things and wait for 'him' down stairs sch gate dere.. lata he came.. everybody was like screaming at the top of their voices sia.. haha.. OMG.. ear drum gone.. LOLx.. jk lahx.. yup.. and den he went off.. fit zai came.. and was pissed wif some * B*TCH ~! sae things nb think den sae.. den always ACT ! Wah.. for goodness sake lahx.. STOP ACTING lahx.. be REAL ! u B*TCH.. not even i cant stand u.. even ur frenx oso.. so STOP it!!! and now to the BBQ.. i went home den was kinda tired.. so lay on my bed.. rest.. but dunno y rest abit onli.. i slp.. haha.. den was so so late when wanting to mit maine, amoi and 'dad' and of cos fit zai.. =X.. sorrie.. aniwae.. was dere.. walking alone.. thinking of mani a things.. haix.. i think it's time i forget dat 'someone'.. cos it's like.. IMPOSSIBLE dat kind of things? he onli like dat the other 'someone'.. so i think forget it lahx.. exmas cuming.. CONCENTRATE !!! whahahahaha.. den reach dere.. greet ppl over dere.. especially my 'dad'.. haha.. did not realli tok to fit zai for the start.. cos dunno, mood swing i guess.. den we all started to cook.. haha.. eat eat eat.. drink dirnk drink.. luff luff luff.. den ruffy was dere.. dunno y suddenly got the urge to go carry him and YES .. i did it.. not scare of him aniwae.. haha.. but onli ruffy lahx.. haha.. he ah.. veri cute, handsome too.. especially when the wind blow his little fringe.. haha.. and dat's the end.. i went home the earilest i guess.. cos my mum lahx.. haix.. den fit zai and amoi acc. mi to outside.. i took a cab and went home.. now.. for gratitude.. amoi thankx for hearing those rubbish or my anger words.. i feel betta and i'll try to control nxt time.. i promise.. cos dat's the way to change ya.. nxt time got anithing, jux write it out to the blog.. and my 'dad'.. always veri good to mi de.. but last time i always bully him.. sorrie ah.. and to fit zai.. goody de buddy.. tok anithing under the sun.. haha.. sori bout yesterdae.. and to maine.. my BESTIE for 4 yrs.. happy early birhtdae.. and dun sad k.. no him got US.. hehehe.. yup.. dat's it.. P.S: Amoi.. happy 1/2 a yr wif nah..

hmm.. haven being here for abt couple of daes? lazy.. haha.. =X.. on sundae went to see fireworks wif my 'fit zai yi jia zhu'.. got cal maine.. but she dun wanna cum.. alamak.. funny woman.. aniwae.. mi and fit zai went to collect things 1st.. cos hor.. apple's de bdae present cum liaox.. cum.. i nb go take.. too busy.. *sorrie ya.. den fit zai go collect his 'ai ren' de things and bought a disc for his dad..(for his bdae..) den amoi came late.. dat day i onli ate bread for dinner.. OMG.. torturing the pig.. haha.. den went to C fireworks.. guess wad.. we sat at the side of the road somemore at the 'highway'.. haha.. den got mani ppl park their car dere C.. but got police go copy the number plates.. alamak.. y like dat.. ppl wanna see lehx.. share share mahx.. y like dat nehx.. and so.. the firework started.. it was veri nice.. yet veri 'qua zhang'.. cos it's hongkong de.. (u noe wad i meant rite?) haha.. aniwae.. it was realli nice.. den lata go suntec.. i go turn the hp key chain again.. LOLx.. den fit zai and amoi sae mi.. hang so mani, not heavy mehx.. haha.. i dun care lahx.. i like can le.. whahahahaha.. den come to mondae.. wah pengx.. i late lehx.. all becos of dat bus.. *F*CK~! change timing like no body's business.. haix those ppl dat take dat time de bus all late.. somemore nid serve LRC .. *SH*T! QI SI WO le.. haix.. nbm lahx.. alreadi past le.. den todae all chiong for ART once again and again and again.. LOLLLLLx.. our class now is super stress up and ideals all use up.. brain bursting.. brain cells use up to limit.. whahahahaha..*so 'qua zhang'.. aniwae.. dou it dun seems like.. can feel how they all are feeling.. den hu noes ah ong sae tue den last dae.. OMG.. everybody wad like.. y dun wanna sae eariler.. alamak .. haha.. den all abit less stress.. den ah.. my fit zai 'kor' and 'da sao' quarrel.. alamak.. dun quarrel lahx.. try to give in.. fit zai u always teach mi de ok! but.. sometimes must think be4 u give in.. cos not always u in the wrong.. dun so STUPID .. understand?! dun let 'fit zai yi jia zhu' worry for u 2 both.. yup.. one thing i veri angry yesterdae.. amoi hor.. dunno y.. sae her abit.. angry until like i own her millions of $$$ dun wanna return like dat worx.. *scared.. *bleah~! den i told bel.. bel sae.. dun care lahx.. always like dat de.. use to it le.. haix.. den i tink tink.. i tink amoi too stress.. but ah.. must try control mahx.. ppl beside u dun own u anithing worx.. and i noe i own u $30.. i will return u de.. tue.. haix.. sad.. fatty is gone.. no one to 'tok' to mi le.. or let mi scold for nth.. *Oops.. haix.. fatty jux slp sp sweetly yet itchly den go le.. haix.. remind mi of my ah gong.. miss him.. last sundae go pray him.. 'tok' to him too.. tell him summary of my life and studies.. dunno he got listen not.. den almost cry out.. i den noe dat i realli miss him.. belive it or not.. he did came to my dreams and told mi to STUDY HARD ~! but it's after his 7 daes which was like 2yrs ago or so.. ha! so i now everytime wanna slp during exams, i'll tell myself dat cant slp.. must do~! haha.. it sound kinda lame.. but it works.. hee~ aniwae.. todae i got to serve LRC then oso nid to rush for ART.. OMG.. realli can kill man.. all rushing and veri scare cant do finish.. it's good dat most of dem finish.. whahahahaha.. den bird and i went to carry those heavy boards to mr ong den cal him send to gmthss and we ran to MMS to buy tibits.. whahahaha.. den go serve LRC.. OMG.. it's so boring dere.. alomst slp dere.. haha.. den after dat.. eat den go tuition.. *dying.. haha.. and my daes end.. *tired, brain bursting too..

hmm.. todae's the wed of the week and i have prelims tml~ *OMG.. so sickening can~ after ART some PRELIM s.. dey're killing mi.. *HELP~!! todae.. can sae slack whole dae.. chinese period dat time dat sicko HUANG I MEI lost her mind once again and start to stare at ppl frm class sec.4d.. haix.. y r all t-chers like dat?? aniwae.. our class oso not dat bad wad.. we're always the ' TOY ' dat when t-chers r angry dey jux stomp into our class to vent their anger.. OMG.. wad a world.. can someone sae smth dat's fair??! dou i noe nth's fair.. *sign.. den.. fit zai and 'da sao' quarrel again.. alamak.. y 2 loving couple kip quarreling nehx?? but some sae.. 1st sour den sweet.. so bear wif it ya??! *jia you~ fit family always dere for u~! yup.. and comes to LRC .. OMG.. B..O..R..I..N..G~ alomst dose off.. LOLx.. aniwae.. tried to study social studies.. but.. cant go in.. dunno y too.. *sign.. so now.. i'm struggling wif my social studies now.. and oso typing.. *stress.. always last mintue.. hope dat N lvls not last min.. *scareded.. and ya.. LRC todae was like a 'RAVE' party to those sitting outside of the room.. whahahahaha.. cos we all buy mani tibits to eat, chit chat~! muahahaha.. we r 2 relax liaox.. haha.. even mrs. poh dun even noe.. OMG.. haha.. den amoi dey all cal ppl buy food come up gib dem sia.. wah.. realli no 'government' LOLx~! yet.. it's a good experience.. LOLx.. damn fun.. so cool too~ erm.. den we tok, play all the time.. could not realli concentrate, dat's y now struggling wif SS.. ha! yup.. and lata of cos, i dis pig went to eat my favourite.. MEE SOTO !! onli like my sch one.. haha.. *bias.. but, it's reali nice~! *yummy~!! den maine sae she got to go early cos her brother suddenly sick and she got to bring him go see doc.. so leave mi and fit zai.. we 2 went to bball dere cos fit zai wanna go play.. so i wait norx.. hehe.. im patient de ok~! whahahahaha.. den lata went home, go out eat dinner.. my mum start her madness once again.. started screaming as dou she's singing the OPERA ??! OMG.. she sing onli all glass break.. LOLx.. =X.. jk.. she's venting her anger once again.. sometimes i wonder y m i always treated like dat.. *sign.. *sadified.. ok.. den i shall stop here.. hope dat no worries will invade mi during all my exams and wish dat i could pass??! and fit zai and mine da sao ok~!! done~! miss u all.. bye.. take care.. *jump down builing~!!

OMG.. the sickening PRELIM s have started once again.. and i did not realli prepare myself for it..*worried!! aniwae.. my whole class have alreadi gave an agreement to each other dat all dun study for these 2 papers.. jux do wadeva we noe.. and we did it.. and can see from t-chers those FACE s.. *sign.. and ya.. dat sickening, insanetive, mad, idiotic, f*cking B*tch mdm loh, S*CKs to the CORE !! she's realli damn too much lohx.. ppl haven finish their paper rite, she go collect.. wah.. she think she so funny lehx.. *PUT~! shitty woman.. insult our class in directly.. SHIT u~!! HATE all u t-chers.. always like dis.. dun u noe the meaning of patients??! no patients wanna cum tok so much.. *qi si wo le.. jux hate it when ppl like dat treat my class.. u all dun even noe wad r we thinking or shld i sae u all dun even wanna noe wad we thinking and always ani o how make conculsion.. SHIT~! and dat mdm loh.. for goodness sake lahx!!! pls noe ur manners hor.. dun think u t-cher big hor.. todae becos of one lame paper stand beside mi and shout so loud.. u think no body noe ur voice loud ah.. u're oso super evil.. like to see ppl in trouble.. u're jux a F*CKING B*TCH~!!! HATE u~!! confiscate my letter somemore shout so loud.. dunno how to sae probably izzit.. *kick ur ASS go holland~!!! *cool down.. ok. now i feel betta le.. ppl reading.. sorrie ya.. cos i alreadi sae if i angry now.. i'll 'ren' until i cum home write blog.. now i trying to get use to it.. to change of cos~! *wish mi luck~!! yup.. and todae i told amoi one super big secret dat i've kept in my heart for abt one week le.. she was kinda shocked~ but i realli hope she dun sae out lohx.. cos i dun wanna everything dat i have now to disappear.. *pls.. aniwae.. amoi oso got thing wanna sae haven sae.. cos of dat B*TCH lahx.. OMG.. the papers are like so so hard man~ haix.. i got study like nb like dat.. and dat amoi forgotten abt the letter she wanna gib mi.. *SHIT.. hai wo whole nite think wad u wanna tell mi.. haha.. aniwae.. todae de 2 science paper hor.. one word..
